overview: Maddy O'Reilly stars as Monica, a baby sitter who has fallen hopelessly in love with gorgeous MILF Julia (Raylene). Monica and her mischievous crew of baby sitter BFFs hatch a plan to seduce Julia's girlfriend, but when the girls prove to be more interested in fucking each other than their target, Monica has to take things into her own hands if she wants to win Julia's heart.
tagline: Lesbian sitters always satisfy lesbian desires!
title: Lesbian Sitters
